TextView.android:text: I'm sorry to hear that! Sometimes when you're angry it can be good to take a short breather. Here's some tips for when I'm angry: 1. Having a kneadable eraser or something similar. Your hands have something to do that can distract you from the anger you're feeling until you feel ready to think through it again later! 2. Do something fun! You shouldn't have to be miserable because you're in a bad situation.
